title: How The Soros Attack Machine Works (Ep 1699)
description:
In this episode I address the George Soros-funded operation to shut down free speech. 

News Picks:

Axios is concerned about the new conservative power players.

Biden is looking to grab your guns again.


Rumble makes a big announcement about its growth numbers.


What was the FBI doing with this powerful spyware program?


Hunter Biden’s buddy is free to roam around, while Jan 6th defendants sit in jail?
